articles.title: DPRK Permanent Mission to UN Issues Press Statement
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Mission to UN Issues Press Statement
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Permanent Mission to the United Nations issued a press statement on Oct. 21. It said:
					 The Permanent Mission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) to the United Nations issues this press statement with regard to the continuing forced adoption of the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" of the UN Security Council, which do not carry legality, morality and impartiality at all.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" adopted so far in the Security Council are all illegal criminal documents fabricated by arbitrariness of the United States encroaching upon the UN Charter and other recognized international laws.
					
					 It is heart of the issue that the UN Security Council is continuing to fabricate those anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" under the pretext of its determination that DPRK's nuclear tests and satellites launches pose "threats to international peace and security".
					
					 If our nuclear tests and peaceful satellites launches pose threats to the international peace and security, then why has the UN Security Council never taken issue with the nuclear tests and satellites launches conducted by other countries?
					
					 Does the UN Security Council has any authority to prohibit nuclear tests and satellites launches whosoever conducted by them?
					
					 If the UN Security Council has the authority to prohibit nuclear tests and satellites launches whosoever conducted by them, here is the question raised again why the Security Council has never prohibited the nuclear tests and satellites launches of other countries until now.
					
					 There are already relevant international treaties pertaining to the nuclear tests and satellite development, and therefore sovereign states can strictly join in these treaties fully on a voluntary basis. 
					
					 The DPRK requested the UN Secretariat to clarify legal basis of the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" imposed by the UN Security Council, but the Secretariat has not answered yet to these questions.
					
					 Unless these questions are addressed, none of the UN member states could accept or implement any of the "sanctions resolutions" of the UN Security Council.
					
					 UN member states should pay primary attention to the reason of why discussion on having fundamental reform of the UN system centered on power countries is not yet making any progress, although it came a long way of discussion. 
					
					 If the UN member states tolerate and blindly follow the acts of arbitrariness of power countries who are misusing the Security Council, the Council then will merely turn into a ground where the power countries go rampant and behave as an emperor more than ever before. 
					
					 In the 17th Summit of Heads of State and Government of the Non-Aligned Movement held last September and in the G-77 Ministerial Meeting held on the margin of the 71st session of the UN General Assembly, there were adopted the Final Document and Declaration respectively opposing and rejecting both the UN Security Council "sanctions resolutions" and unilateral sanctions of the U.S. and western countries against the DPRK. This opposition and rejection is an answer and the voice of justice of the international community to the questions raised above.

articles.title: Greetings to Zambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zambian President
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Edgar Lungu, president of the Republic of Zambia, on the 52nd anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president good health and great success in his work and his people prosperity, expressing the expectation that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow strong in the mutual interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for Vietnam and Indonesia
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for Vietnam, Indonesia
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, left here on Monday to take part in the 18th International Meeting of Communist Parties and Workers' Parties to be held in Vietnam and to visit Indonesia.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A Chinese delegation led by Liu Zhenmin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, arrived here Monday to take part in the 3rd meeting of the Korea-China Border Joint Commission.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A Chinese delegation to participate in the 3rd meeting of Korea-China Border Joint Commission laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them on Monday.

articles.title: Seminar Held on Day of UN
articles.content:
Seminar Held on Day of UN
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A seminar on Day of the United Nations was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Monday.
					 Present at the seminar were the UN resident coordinator and concurrently UNDP resident representative and staff members of international organizations here.
					
					 Officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and the Ministry of Agriculture and foreign diplomatic envoys here were present there on invitation.
					
					 There were speeches about the aid projects of UN bodies in the fields of food and nutrition safety, health, water sanitation, education, development of natural energy in the DPRK from 2017 to 2021.
					
					 The UN resident coordinator and concurrently UNDP resident representative hosted a reception on the same day.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kulloja Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kulloja Marked
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Kulloja, an organ of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 President Kim Il Sung provided the tradition of the revolutionary media in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and founded Kulloja, political and theoretical magazine, on Oct. 25, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 He made it sure that the title of the magazine was called "Kulloja" and indicated all problems including the orientation of its edition, contents and distribution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il devoted all efforts and soul to improving the editing of the magazine. 
					
					 For the past seven decades the magazine has inspired officials, party members and other people to accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche in the van of party's ideological and theoretical agitation drive while devotedly defending the party with the writing brush of the revolution. 
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, officials of ministries and national institutions, journalists and editors of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House and information officials in charge of theory in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Symposium on Work for Protecting Intangible Cultural Heritages Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Work for Protecting Intangible Cultural Heritages Held
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A symposium on the work for protecting intangible cultural heritages took place at the Sci-Tech Complex Monday.
					 Present there were officials, teachers, researchers and working people in the field of education, science and protection of national heritages.
					
					 The speakers said that lots of natural heritages have been discovered and glorified as the treasures of the nation thanks to the noble patriotism of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They underlined the need to develop national music, dance and fine art, encourage the national sports and value our own things and positively preserve them, having the high pride and self-esteem that our socialist natural culture is the best.
					
					 They called for contributing to further glorifying the DPRK into the worldwide highly civilized nation and prospering country with the time-honored history and brilliant culture.
					
					 Diplomas were awarded to the nationally registered intangible cultural heritages at the symposium.

articles.title: Nano Sci-Tech Presentation and Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Nano Sci-Tech Presentation and Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The 13th national nano sci-tech presentation and exhibition were opened with due ceremony at the State Nanotechnology Bureau Monday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea
					 They brought together officials, scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and graduate students of more than 30 units including  Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the State Nanotechnology Bureau, the Nano Materials Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and the Agricultural Nano Technology Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science.
					
					 The presentation was divided into panels of nano theory, measurement, nano materials, nano agriculture and medical science.
					
					 The presentation heard more than 90 papers.
					
					 On display at the exhibition were products of at least 100 varieties and materials showing the successes made in nano technical introduction into various fields including agriculture, metal, building materials, light industry and medical science.
					
					 The presentation and exhibition will last till Oct. 28.

articles.title: Educational Aid to Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Educational Aid to Disaster Areas
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Education Commission of the DPRK has striven to put the educational work in the flood-hit northern part of the country on a normal basis as soon as possible.
					 Recently the Commission provided 35,000 pieces of teaching tools in more than one hundred kinds and many musical instruments, sports apparatuses and various amusement facilities and playthings for the flood-hit areas. It had already sent many textbooks, reference books and more than 10,000 experimental apparatuses and reagents to the schools in disaster areas.
					
					 The Ministry of General Education under the Commission prepared more than one thousand pieces of visual aids and other educational equipment and facilities in a few days.

articles.title: Cement Production for Recovery Effort Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Cement Production for Recovery Effort Increases in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Cement producers in different parts of the DPRK have over-fulfilled their production plans for the recovery effort in the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					 In hearty response to the Workers' Party of Korea's call for all-out recovery efforts, the Sangwon Cement Complex turned out more than 160 000 tons of cement, surpassing the level of peak year in production.
					
					 The Sunchon Cement Complex carried out its daily quota at 130 percent and the Chonnaeri Cement Factory produced 10 000 tons of cement in a short period.
					
					 The Puraesan Cement Factory, too, over-fulfilled its production plan for the recovery efforts 2.3 times.

articles.title: River Improvement Project Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
River Improvement Project Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A river improvement project is going on in different parts of the DPRK.
					 Necessary steps have been taken to protect rivers and streams from any possible typhoon.
					
					 The Sinuiju Amnokgang Construction Company in North Phyongan Province launched the embankment projects in Sin Islet and Hadan-ri.
					
					 Similar projects were pushed ahead in Anju City of South Phyongan Province and Paechon County of South Hwanghae Province, too.
					
					 Meanwhile, Hamhung City and Yonggwang County of South Hamgyong Province finished several embankment projects along the Songchon River in short span of time.

articles.title: Pharmacopoeia Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Pharmacopoeia Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A book "Pharmacopoeia of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" has been recently published in the DPRK.
					 The book deals with more than 880 kinds of medicines widely used in the DPRK and other countries.
					
					 It helps the relevant units develop more medicines of world level and pharmaceutical factories and hospitals considerably raise the proportion of home-made medicines.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts U.S. Moves to Knock into Shape Triangular Military Alliance
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts U.S. Moves to Knock into Shape Triangular Military Alliance
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now working in real earnest to knock into shape a triangular military alliance aimed to realize its ambition to dominate the world. 
					 Shortly ago, the U.S. together with riff-raffs of Japan and south Korean puppet military held a "meeting of joint chiefs of staff" in the U.S. at which they were closeted over the proposal for bolstering up the extended deterrence under the pretext of the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 This was part of the U.S. moves to build the triangular military alliance with Japan and south Korea under the pretext of the "threat" from someone and seize military hegemony by containing China and Russia in the region. 
					
					 By extended deterrence the U.S. means dealing counter-blows by using various combat capabilities including nuclear umbrella on the same level as that when its mainland is exposed to attack in case its allies come under serious threat including nuclear strike. 
					
					 The U.S. promised the offer of extended deterrence to south Korea in June 2009 and has since made every effort to round off the triangular military alliance. 
					
					 It is the sinister scenario of the U.S. to put south Korea and Japan within the framework of the triangular military alliance and use them as a shock brigade in realizing world domination in a bid to fish in troubled waters. 
					
					 To this end it concluded a contract on sharing information in 2014, used it as a springboard and a legal basis for forming military nexus among the three parties. At the 4th meeting of vice-foreign ministers of the U.S., Japan and south Korea the U.S. sought measures for boosting cooperation among them. 
					
					 In a recent period, the U.S. staged a missile alert drill together with Japan and south Korean puppet forces in the waters off Hawaii for the first time in history. Most recently they held joint drill called "naval interception operational drill" in the open sea east of Jeju Island. 
					
					 The U.S. moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea are a product of its hegemonic scenario to hasten the formation of the triangular military alliance and thus build a missile shield in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Viktor Poznikhir, first vice general director of the General Operation Bureau of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, said that the purpose of THAAD deployment is to neutralize the two countries of Russia and China, adding that the "U.S. decision is not to cope with the missile threat from the DPRK. The decision is aimed to seize military edge over Russia and China".
					
					 The appearance of NATO of Asian version with the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea as a parent body has become a reality and now it is impossible to avert a new arms race and a new Cold War in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal wrecking global peace and stability as it is talking about "extended deterrence" under the watchword of "preemptive nuclear attack." 
					
					 The international community is called upon to be vigilant mainly against the U.S. dangerous hegemonic scenario.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Confrontational Burlesque Denounced by KCNA
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Confrontational Burlesque Denounced by KCNA
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors are getting ever more frantic in their racket for escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 The dark tentacles of the conspiracy of the witch of Chongwadae have stretched even to culture and arts to such extent that anti-DPRK drama "DMZ 1584" which incites confrontation with the DPRK is now being openly staged in the south Korean society. 
					
					 The drama dealing with the "mine explosion" that occurred in the south side area of the Demilitarized Zone along the Military Demarcation Line in August last year is meant for kicking up another confrontation racket by creating extreme hostility toward the DPRK among south Koreans.
					
					 This is another traitorous and anti-reunification fascist act as it is a deliberate and wanton perfidy to the historic August agreement in which the north and the south agreed to check armed conflict, defuse tension and promote the development of relations.
					
					 This farce clearly proved that Park is a trouble-maker fostering discord and inciting confrontation and war among compatriots, a cancer-like entity who should never be pardoned and the worst witch who has to be eliminated.
					
					 As well known, in the "August incident" last year in which the situation inched close to the touch-and-go one, south Korean soldiers were maimed by a mine which the Park group planted to kill soldiers of the Korean People's Army just as a saying goes "A wicked man is his own hell".
					
					 But just as a thief crying "Stop the thief!" Park linked the case which was denounced and thrown into the cesspool with the DPRK, and cooked a farce to put it on the stage. This can be committed only by Park hell-bent on provocation and confrontation.
					
					 No wonder, south Koreans call Park the worst swindler cooking up "stories about provocations".
					
					 She even set the stage of "admission-free" performance, unbecoming for the money-all-mighty corrupt society. This proves what extent her hysteric confrontation hysteria has reached.
					
					 Lurking behind this is her sinister intention.
					
					 It is to stir up the atmosphere of extreme "security unrest" in south Korea, tide over her serious ruling crisis and prolong her dirty remaining days even a bit.
					
					 But with no sleight of hand can she calm down ever-mounting anti-Park atmosphere or quell south Koreas' longing and wishes for alliance with the north.
					
					 "When the crow flies, her tail follows". Park's desperate anti-DPRK burlesque will only precipitate her death.
					
					 The rule of traitors is bound to lead to destruction and crimes are bound to bring punishment.
					
					 Park can never redeem the thrice-cursed crimes she has committed before the nation during the tenure of her office.
					
					 We would like to tell the south Korean persons of culture and arts. If they are true persons of culture and arts, they should not follow the confrontational racket of Park who is more dead than alive, forsaken by the people, but immediately stop the provocative performance.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellites Launches Fully Conform with International Laws: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellites Launches Fully Conform with International Laws: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's satellites launches are an exercise of the legitimate and universally recognized right which fully conforms with the UN Charter whose basic principles are respect for sovereignty and equality and the Outer Space Treaty which stipulates the peaceful use of space and other international laws, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 It says:
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye group is labeling the DPRK's satellites launches and exercise of the right to use space "violation of resolutions" and "illegal ones." This is a far-fetched assertion.
					
					 The puppet group malignantly slandered again the DPRK's legitimate activities for exploring space in a bid to tarnish its image, incite hostility towards it in the international arena and boost "cooperation in pressurizing the north" with outsiders.
					
					 It is disgrace and shame on the nation that the Park group went on the rampage in the international arena as part of smear campaign against the DPRK, crazy with confrontation with the compatriots there.
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean puppet forces may work to isolate and stifle the DPRK with the backing of foreign forces, they can never block its advance.
					
					 The more malignantly the hostile forces pull up the DPRK over its satellites launches, the greater number of Juche satellites will soar into space, leaving their proud vapor trails in the blue sky.
					
					 The Park group had better know that its base moves to block the DPRK from exploring the space for peaceful purposes would only invite censure and denunciation from domestic and foreign public and precipitate its final ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preventing Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preventing Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- To prevent the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning is very important for further consolidating the politico-ideological base of the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 What the imperialists fear most in the way of dominating and plundering other countries is the united strength of the people who have been politically awakened. 
					
					 As the struggle of the people for independence is gaining in scope and strength, the imperialist reactionary forces attach greater importance to the ideological and cultural poisoning and leave no means untried to this end.
					
					 The main purpose of the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning is to spread bourgeois idea and capitalist lifestyle in other countries. 
					
					 In the past the reactionary idea and culture played the role of a guide for aggression, but now it plays a main role for aggression.
					
					 In recent years the U.S. and other imperialist forces brought down governments in some countries and set up pro-U.S. regimes there through ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare. As a matter of fact, this was hard to gain even through wars of aggression claiming huge expenses and heavy casualties. 
					
					 Finding it hard to bring the DPRK under control by force, they are now persistently working to infiltrate capitalist ideas and culture into its society, while frantically conducting all sorts of false propaganda against it, the article says, calling for rooting out all sorts of unsound and non-socialist factors in all fabrics of the society and establishing noble ideological and moral traits and lifestyle.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Accused of Working Hard to Stay in Power
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Accused of Working Hard to Stay in Power
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative group is becoming all the more undisguised in its moves to stay in power, which means the tightened bloody and fascist dictatorial rule and endless misfortune, pain and disaster of the south Korean people, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The Park Geun Hye group's above-said moves can never be pardoned as they are an outrageous act of going against the aspiration and wishes of the south Korean people and the trend of the times, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Park group is the remnants of the old era who inherited the crime-woven lineage of "yusin", reactionaries of history and the ferocious fascist junta keen to revive the bloody and dark era of "yusin" which trampled down the demand of the popular masses for independence and their democratic aspiration through brutal repressive rule.
					
					 The Park group is, at the same time, the one of the man-killers who turned south Korea into the worst tundra of human rights in the world and a veritable hell while enforcing an unpopular rule and committing scandals. 
					
					 The waves of anti-"government" actions of the people from all walks of life are sweeping south Korea.
					
					 Much upset by this, the puppet conservative group is craftily scheming to appease and deceive the people in a bid to stay in power, while intensifying the fascist crackdown.
					
					 But the south Korean people will not be taken in again by the group of traitors. They voted for the witch of Chongwadae after being allured by the conservative group in the past "presidential election" but are now well aware of what disastrous consequences their choice entailed. 
					
					 The puppet conservative group's ambition for staying in power is bound to go bust in the face of the concerted actions of the enraged people and it will be ousted from the arena of history without fail.

articles.title: Citizens in Taejon Area in S. Korea Call for Putting End to Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Taejon Citizens in S. Korea Call for Ending Park Geun Hye Regime
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- 74 civic, public and religious organizations in south Korea including the Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the Taejon Solidarity Council of Civic and Public Organizations and the Taejon Council of Christian Churches, and the Taejon Movement Headquarters for the Defence of Democracy grouping branches of political parties held a meeting on the situation in Taejon on Oct. 20, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 At the meeting the speakers said that they had a meeting to inform about the citizen's anger at the present regime which makes desperate efforts to stay in power and protect its stooges. 
					
					 The Taejon citizens' appeal on the situation was announced. It underscored the need to probe the truth behind the death of peasant Paek Nam Gi and punish those responsible.
					
					 It called for judging the Park Geun Hye regime as it tramples down the right to existence of workers, peasants, the poor and other people and brings about a war to the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group's Racket for Labeling Persons "Forces Following North" Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Conservative Group's Racket for Labeling Persons "Forces Following North" Denounced
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK gave an answer to a question raised by KCNA Sunday as regards the fact that the puppet conservative group are committing despicable politically-motivated terrorist act of branding the Minju Party, an opposition party, as "forces following the north" while deliberately linking them with the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the puppet conservative group including the "Saenuri Party," referring to the disclosure of the fact that the Roh Moo Hyun "government" abstained from voting for the adoption of the "resolution on human rights in the north" at the UN pursuant to the "north's opinion" in November 2007 through a book authored by the former minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, branded it as "an incident of serious harassment of state discipline" and said it is necessary to thoroughly check the "outlook on the north" of those concerned at that time and prosecution investigation is necessary as part of frantic racket for labeling people "forces following the north." The statement went on:
					
					 At that time, the south side had neither suggested any opinion nor informed the north side of its stand to abstain from voting for the adoption of the "resolution on human rights".
					
					 The conservative group including the "Saenuri Party" are branding the opposition party as "forces following the north" while groundlessly peddling the story that the former Roh "government" had "secret communications" with the DPRK. This is just a despicable smear campaign to create an environment favorable for their stay in power in the "presidential election" next year, divert elsewhere the attention of the public focused on the hideous corruption and irregularities committed by traitor Park Geun Hye and tide over the daily worsening ruling crisis.
					
					 The recent racket disclosed once again the despicable nature of the "Saenuri Party" and other conservative forces as an anti-reunification group denying the north-south declarations. It is clearly proven that the "north's human rights issue" touted by the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group was prompted by their sinister intention to block the improvement of the north-south relations and escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The puppet group are resorting to the old "coloring theory" and the racket for labeling persons "forces following the north" but it is a foolish and suicidal act of pricking one's own eyes with one's own hand.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Slam U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Authorities' War Confab
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Slam U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Authorities' War Confab
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in south Korea including the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 20 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' confab to bring about a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The organization in a press release said that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities will hold an annual security consultative meeting and discuss the period and way of THAAD development.
					
					 They are seeking to discuss the proposal to increase effect of the extended deterrence including the constant deployment of U.S. Aegis destroyer in south Korea and the problem for concluding a military agreement with Japan, the press release noted.
					
					 The press release declared that the organizations will strive to check THAAD deployment by the efforts of the people including inhabitants in Songju and Kimchon and religionists of Won Buddhism.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Slam Police Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Slam Police Crimes
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Struggle for Paek Nam Gi and the 2016 Headquarters of Struggle or People's All-out Action, civic and public organizations of south Korea, held a press conference on Oct. 21 denouncing the fascist police for trying to make an autopsy of dead peasant Paek Nam Gi in a bid to cover up the crimes it committed, according to a report.
					 A press release was read out at the conference held in Seoul.
					
					 It said that the police inflicted severe injuries upon many people with water canons at the people's all-out action last year and committed brutal action of mercilessly firing water cannons to citizens who attempted to help Paek and ambulance car for the wounded.
					
					 It urged the police to stop acting as a running dog serving the regime, stop the attempt for making an autopsy of Paek and arrest, censure and dismiss those responsible.
					
					 On Oct. 20, the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty held a press conference outside the building of the puppet Police Agency, calling for a stop to the move for an autopsy of Paek.

articles.title: S. Korean Forces Accused of Holding Campaign to Eliminate "Followers of North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Forces Accused of Holding Campaign to Eliminate "Followers of North"
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Mun Jae In, former representative of the Minju Party of south Korea, held a press conference in Inchon on Oct. 17 to denounce the puppet ruling party for kicking off the campaign to eliminate the "forces following the north", according to south Korean MBC.
					 As regards the controversy over the memoirs of Song Min Sun, former minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, the "Saenuri Party" is using the campaign to eliminate the "followers of the north" and the "coloring theory" as a motive power for state administration, Mun said, adding:
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is plunging the inter-Korean relations into the partisan strife in a bid to cover up the power-backed scandals.
					
					 He underscored the need to change the regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Park Geun Hye and "Saenuri Party"
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Park Geun Hye and "Saenuri Party"
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on October 19 carried an editorial titled "Park Geun Hye regime, make an apology for northern limit line racket".
					 The editorial said that the "Saenuri Party" launched a campaign to drive the opposition party forces into a tight corner, while taking issue with what was uttered by "president" Roh Moo Hyun over the "northern limit line" at the time of the publication of the October 4 declaration in 2012.
					
					 It went on: Later all the persons related to the summit talks were given a verdict of not guilty and a lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party" who took the issue with the speech by Roh Moo Hyun was fined and the former representative of the "Saenuri Party" made an apology. All these proved that the dispute on the "northern limit line" was a political offensive.
					
					 Now there occurred suspicions about Choe Sun Sil and MIR and K-Sports foundations and investigation into U Pyong U is nearly an end and the anti-opposition party offensive began. It was by no means accidental.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" would be well advised to behave themselves with reason, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Condemn U.S. and Puppet Group's War Moves
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Condemn U.S. and Puppet Group's War Moves
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism in south Korea held a peace action outside the puppet Ministry of Defense on Oct. 20 to denounce the war moves of the U.S. and the puppet group, according to a report.
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification said the extended deterrence to be provided by the U.S. is an act of bringing a nuclear war to this land as it is little short of attacking the north with U.S. nukes.
					
					 It demanded the belligerent military strategy inflicting huge burden on the people and threatening their life be cancelled.
					
					 The Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism expressed the will to continue actions for checking THAAD deployment and defending peace.

articles.title: S. Korean Youth and Students Declare to Launch Anti-"Government" Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Youth and Students Declare to Launch Anti-"Government" Struggle
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- TheCommittee for Promoting the 2016 Youth All-out Action in south Korea involving 13 youth and students organizations held a press conference in Seoul on October 20 to declare the struggle to punish the Park Geun Hye regime, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 A press release was read out at the press conference.
					
					 It declared that youth and students will go on the struggle in unity to put an end to the Park Geun Hye regime with the 2016 youth all-out action as a start.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Stage Anti-War Peace Action
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Stage Anti-War Peace Action
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. simultaneously staged actions for peace against war in major cities such as Washington, New York, Los Angeles and Philadelphia on Oct. 21 in protest against the THAAD deployment in south Korea and the U.S. war moves, according to a report.
					 The participants said that the THAAD deployment and the U.S. forces presence overseas are increasing the danger of war worldwide.
					
					 In order to preserve peace on the Korean peninsula, it is necessary for the U.S. troops to quit south Korea, they noted.
					
					 Bitterly denouncing the U.S. belligerent policy, they strongly demanded the U.S. stop war moves and withdraw its forces from south Korea.
					
					 In the evening they marched streets with candlelights in their hands.

articles.title: U.S. Must Properly Understand Strength and Will of DPRK: Nigerian Body
articles.content:
U.S. Must Properly Understand Strength and Will of DPRK: Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article on Oct. 12.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Obama administration has gone ever more reckless in the racket to ratchet up sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 This shows the sad plight of Obama, who was awarded even Nobel Peace Prize for the "feats" performed for his call for building a "world free from nuclear weapons" but has no option but to hand down "the DPRK possessed of nuclear capacity of striking at the U.S. mainland" as "legacy of his office" to the new administration.
					
					 The U.S. unprecedented moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK have resulted in making the DPRK emerge as a full-fledged nuclear giant.
					
					 However, the U.S. has threatened the DPRK by introducing more nuclear strategic assets into the Korean peninsula, far from drawing a lesson from the above-said result.
					
					 The U.S. is the first country to be tried by the ICC as it has viciously thrown a blockade around the sovereign country and ratcheted up sanctions against it.
					
					 A declaration was published at the 77 Group ministerial meeting held on the sidelines of the 71st UN General Assembly to reject the unilateral sanctions against the DPRK and demand the immediate lift of the sanctions. This is a natural reaction of the international community to the U.S. arbitrary practices. 
					
					 The DPRK is a nuclear giant possessed of the extremely high nuclear striking capacity.
					
					 The U.S. must properly understand the strength and will of the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo, Stamp and Art Exhibitions Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo, Stamp and Art Exhibitions Held Abroad
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Russia, Indonesia, India, Peru and South Africa held Korean book, photo, stamp and art exhibitions from Sept. 28 to Oct. 20 on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were also their works, books, stamps and photos introducing the DPRK and art pieces dealing with the talents and wisdom of the Korean people.
					
					 A vice-minister of International and Regional Cooperation of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia said that the exhibition would be a significant occasion for Russians to know better about the DPRK making a rapid development under the guidance of the Party.
					
					 The general chairperson of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia noted that the WPK is the powerful party that leads the revolution and construction with the unique method of leadership over masses.
					
					 The chairman of a school council in India said that all victories and successes being made in the DPRK are the fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speakers at the exhibition held in South Africa praised the advantageous socialist system of Korea in which the politics of loving the people has been pursued, saying that the WPK holding HE Kim Jong Un at its top post has a promising future.

articles.title: Brazilian Bodies Praise WPK
articles.content:
Brazilian Bodies Praise WPK
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Brazilian bodies posted special write-ups on their websites to celebrate the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on Oct. 9 and 10 posted on its website articles titled "Leader Kim Jong Il's exploits will be immortal along with red flag of WPK" and "Party that serves people."
					
					 The articles said that Kim Jong Il is the eternal head of the Party as he lives forever as the sun along with the flag of the WPK, telling about his exploits for building the Party.
					
					 Saying that the history of the WPK features a struggle to serve the people and bring happiness to them, they praised the WPK's politics of loving the people.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on Oct. 18 posted on its website an article titled "Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) and WPK".
					
					 The article said that the WPK can't be separated from the DIU, the first revolutionary organization formed by President Kim Il Sung, because it is just the roots of the WPK.
					
					 Saying that the programme of the DIU served as the base of the programme of the WPK, it introduced the immediate tasks and final goal of the DIU, adding that the 70-odd-year long history of the WPK was the course for attaining the final goal of the DIU.
					
					 The article said that the principle of independence upheld by the DIU became the steadfast guidelines for the building and activities of the WPK and vanguard fighters of the new generation trained by the DIU became the backbone of the founding of the WPK.

articles.title: Korean Socialism Is Sure to Win: Serbian Political Party
articles.content:
Korean Socialism Is Sure to Win: Serbian Political Party
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia posted an article titled "Korean socialism" on its website on Oct. 9.
					 Korean socialism makes the desire of the popular masses to lead an independent and creative life freed from all domination and subjugation be realized smoothly in all fabrics of social life, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Its invincibility lies in the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses.
					
					 Socialism centred on the popular masses has been built in the DPRK as it holds the distinguished leaders who love and take the best care of the people.
					
					 It is also because the people boundlessly revere and hold in high esteem their leader as the father and remain loyal to him.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea takes the Juche idea as the guiding idea, and regards it as its fighting goal to accomplish the cause of the popular masses for independence.
					
					 Korean socialism is being further consolidated thanks to the politics of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people by supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the idea of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of Korean socialism, and HE Kim Jong Il, eternal head of the Workers' Party of Korea, on believing in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 Korean socialism is sure to win.

articles.title: Representacion coreana ante la ONU publica comunicado
articles.content:
Representacion coreana ante la ONU publica comunicado
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Representacion Permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU hizo publico el dia 21 un comunicado que revela lo injusto de las "resoluciones de sancion" sobre la RPDC adoptadas por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, y lo divulgo al Secretariado de esta organizacion internacional y a las representaciones de los paises y al cuerpo de reporteros acreditados en la ONU.
					El documento senala que el Consejo de Seguridad esta aprobando de modo coercitivo las "resoluciones de sancion" sobre la RPDC, carentes de legalidad, moralidad e imparcialidad. Las califica de documentos ilegales fabricados por el despotismo de EE.UU. en desprecio a la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales reconocidas.
					
					La esencia del problema reside en que el Consejo de Seguridad describe la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos de la RPDC como "amenaza a la paz internacional" y a base de esto, inventa de manera continua las "resoluciones de sancion" sobre la RPDC, critica el comunicado y prosigue:
					
					?Por que el Consejo de Seguridad no ha aplicado hasta la fecha la sancion sobre la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de otros paises si estas cosas fueran amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales?
					
					?Acaso tiene el Consejo de Seguridad alguna autoridad de prohibir la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de algun pais?
					
					Si la tiene, ?por que no ha podido prohibirlos hasta ahora?
					
					En relacion con las actividades nucleares y el desarrollo de satelites, existen los acuerdos internacionales correspondientes, a que pueden afiliarse los Estados soberanos de manera voluntaria.
					
					El Secretariado de la ONU no puede dar todavia la respuesta a la demanda de la RPDC de que aclarara los fundamentos legales de las "resoluciones de sancion" sobre la RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad.
					
					Antes de que sean aclaradas tales dudas, los paises miembros de la ONU no podran aceptar ni ejecutar esas "resoluciones de sancion".
					
					Los paises miembros de la ONU deberan prestar atencion debida al motivo por el cual no se ha resuelto ni en lo minimo el problema de reformar radicalmente el sistema de la ONU centrado en las potencias que se debate desde hace mucho tiempo en los escenarios de la ONU.
					
					Si los paises miembros de la ONU toleran y siguen a ciegas los actos arbitrarios de las potencias que abusan del Consejo de Seguridad, estas se portaran mas como Zeus en este aparato de la ONU.
					
					El documento final, adoptado en la XVII Cumbre de los Paises No Alineados efectuada en septiembre pasado en Venezuela, y la declaracion de la reunion ministerial del G-77, efectuada durante el 71o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, expresaron el rechazo a las sanciones unilaterales de Estados Unidos y el Occidente contra la RPDC. Esto es la respuesta de la sociedad internacional sobre todas las dudas arriba planteadas y la voz de la justicia.

articles.title: CRPP condena alborotos intrigantes contra el partido de oposicion en el Sur de Correa
articles.content:
CRPP condena alborotos intrigantes contra el partido de oposicion en el Sur de Correa
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que la banda conservadora del Sur de Corea perpetra un vil terrorismo politico de acosar al opositor Partido Democratico Dobulo como las "fuerzas pro-Norte" vinculandolo obstinadamente con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio el dia 23 la respuesta siguiente:
					Ultimamente, la banda conservadora surcoreana incluyendo el "Partido Saenuri" insiste en que un libro escrito por el ex ministro de Asuntos Exteriores y Comercio revela el hecho de que en noviembre de 2007 el gobierno de Roh Moo Hyun se abstuvo de los derechos en la votacion por aprobacion del "proyecto de la resolucion de derechos humanos del Norte" en la ONU de acuerdo con la "opinion del Norte". Y desarrolla los freneticos alborotos de "tildar a los opositores de las fuerzas pro-Norte" diciendo que el citado caso deviene un "serio desorden de la disciplina nacional" y tienen que revisar estrictamente la "concepcion sobre el Norte" de los relacionados de aquel tiempo y se necesita la investigacion fiscal.
					
					En aquel tiempo, la parte surena no habia presentado a la parte Norte ninguna opinion relacionada con la supuesta "resolucion de derechos humanos", ni avisado su postura de "abstencion de votar".
					
					El "Partido Saenuri" y otros conservadores surcoreanos tildan al partido opositor de las "fuerzas pro-Norte" insistiendo en que el ex "gobierno" de Roh Moo Hyun se "confabulo" con la RPDC, lo cual no pasa de ser otra conspiracion cobarde tendente a crear un ambiente favorable a su intento de retomar el Poder en las "elecciones presidenciales" del ano que viene y arreglar la crisis de gobernacion que se profundiza mas con el paso de los dias conduciendo en otro la flecha de la opinion publica concentrada en los actos ilicitos y corruptos de la traidora Park Geun-hye.
					
					El presente caso volvio a demostrar claramente la naturaleza sucia del "Partido Saenuri" y otras fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas, colectivo anti-reunificacion que niega las declaraciones intercoreanas, y se ha evidenciado fehacientemente que el "problema de derechos humanos del Norte", de que hablan tanto EE.UU. y la banda de Park Geun-hye, parte solo de la intencion malsana de frenar el mejoramiento de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y buscar la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Si la banda conservadora surcoreana recurre en la invariable "teoria de colores" y la campana de "tildar a los opositores de las fuerzas pro-Norte", lo cual constituye una tonteria de acelerar su destruccion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 52o aniversario de la independencia de Zambia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 52o aniversario de la independencia de Zambia
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 24 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Zambia, Edgar Lungu, con motivo del 52o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano. 
					El remitente expreso la esperanza de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Zambia se ampliaran y se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses mutuos de los pueblos de ambos paises, y deseo al destinatario buena salud y grandes exitos en sus trabajos y al pueblo zambiano, la prosperidad.

articles.title: ACNC critica el drama "DMZ 1584" de contenido anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC critica el drama "DMZ 1584" de contenido anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- La banda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye se muestra mas fanatica en la campana de confrontacion fratricida y sus garras llegan hasta al sector cultural y artistico.
					Como resultado, se estrena abiertamente en la sociedad surcoreana el drama "DMZ 1584" que se trata del "incidente de explosion de mina" que ocurrio en agosto del ano pasado en la parte surena de la Zona Desmilitarizada en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar. 
					
					Esta pieza teatral persigue levantar otra oleada de confrontacion al insuflar en la sociedad surcoreana la extremada hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Es otro acto antinacional y anti-reunificacion que viola y niega totalmente el historico acuerdo de agosto, en que ambas partes coreanas se comprometieron a prevenir el choque armado, aliviar la tension y promover el desarrollo de relaciones bilaterales.
					
					La nueva farsa demuestra que Park Geun-hye es la causa de desastres que busca la confrontacion y guerra sembrando la antipatia y odio entre los connacionales y la diabla que debe ser eliminada cuanto antes de la lista de integrantes de la nacion.
					
					Como todos conocen, el "incidente de agosto" del ano pasado fue causado por los mismos compinches de Park porque las minas plantadas para hacer dano al Ejercito Popular de Corea hirieron de gravedad a soldados surcoreanos al reventar.
					
					Ahora en la sociedad surcoreana se escuchan las voces que califican a Park Geun-hye de estafadora que inventa el inexistente "rumor de provocacion del Norte".
					
					Al reeditar a mas de un ano en la escena artistica el referido incidente que no quieren recordar las personas, Park quiere crear el extremado ambiente de "crisis de seguridad" para salir la grave crisis de gobernacion y alargar su precaria vida politica.
					
					Pero, ella no podra calmar con ningun maquiavelismo el ambiente en su contra que se eleva cada dia mas en el Sur de Corea ni frenar la simpatia con la RPDC y el clima de reunificacion pro-Norte de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Tal farsa intrigante anti-RPDC acelerara solamente la autodestruccion de Park Geun-hye que no puede expiar nunca sus incontables crimenes cometidos ante la nacion durante su mandato.
					
					Los artistas surcoreanos no deben sumarse a la campana de confrontacion fratricida de Park Geun-hye y tienen que parar ahora mismo la funcion del drama "DMZ 1584".
